00019 /** \file
00020   \brief Tools to open the sim port
00021 */
00022 
00023 #ifndef __WINDOWSSIMPORT_H
00024 #define __WINDOWSSIMPORT_H
00025 
00026 #include "simport.h"
00027 #include <windows.h>
00028 #include <time.h>
00029 
00030 /// Base class for virtual ports
00031 class WindowsSimPort : public OBDSimPort {
00032 public:
00033     /// Constructor
00034     WindowsSimPort(const char *portname);
00035 
00036     /// Destructor
00037     virtual ~WindowsSimPort();
00038 
00039     /// Get a string representing the port as it's exposed
00040     /** Take a copy if you care - the memory won't stay valid */
00041     virtual char *getPort();
00042 
00043     /// Read a line from the virtual port
00044     /** Take a copy if you care - the memory won't stay valid */
00045     virtual char *readLine();
00046 
00047     /// Write some data to the virtual port
00048     virtual void writeData(const char *data, int log=1);
00049 
00050 private:
00051     /// Handle onto the windows virtual port
00052     HANDLE portHandle;
00053 
00054     /// The portname for getPort();
00055     char *portname;
00056 
00057     /// Last line read [returned by readLine]
00058     char lastread[4096];
00059 
00060     /// Current char buf [while reading]
00061     char readbuf[4096];
00062 
00063     /// Current position in the read buffer
00064     int readbuf_pos;
00065 };
00066 
00067 #ifndef HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY
00068 // Provide a windows implementation if one doesn't exist
00069 
00070 
00071 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(_MSC_EXTENSIONS)
00072   #define DELTA_EPOCH_IN_MICROSECS  11644473600000000Ui64
00073 #else
00074   #define DELTA_EPOCH_IN_MICROSECS  11644473600000000ULL
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 struct timezone {
00078     int  tz_minuteswest; /* minutes W of Greenwich */
00079     int  tz_dsttime;     /* type of dst correction */
00080 };
00081 
00082 int gettimeofday(struct timeval *tv, struct timezone *tz);
00083 
00084 #endif //HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY
00085 
00086 #endif //__WINDOWSSIMPORT_H
